title: How I use MySQL
contents: Even though you can use MySQL to do a lot of database creation and seeding data, I only ever use it to create schema.sql files.

title: jQuery vs vanilla JavaScript
contents: Both these types of JavaScript language are really useful, but I always tend to fall back to using vanilla JavaScript over jQuery. Thoughts?

title: dotenv npm package is LIFE
contents: I cannot write enought about how much I appreciate the dotenv npm pacakage. Imagine not being able to hide sensitive data in code? Crazy!
